definition.en: Main creator(s) of a written work (use on works, not humans); in wd use P2093 when Wikidata item is unknown or does not exist. The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.
definition.de: Person(en), die ein schriftliches Werk verfasst hat bzw. haben; Für wd P2093 verwenden, falls der Autor in Wikidata nicht bekannt ist. The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.
definition.fr: Créateur d'un texte (wd: utiliser P2093 si l'auteur n'a pas d'élément). The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.
definition.es: creador de un texto; wd: usar P2093 cuando el ítem del autor en Wikidata se desconoce o no existe. The author of this content or rating. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.
